content: That's a great idea! I've actually been experimenting with different scents, and lavender is my favorite so far. I've found that it really helps me relax and unwind. And yeah, adding some plants or greenery to the reading nook sounds like a wonderful idea. I've heard that having plants around can really purify the air and create a calming atmosphere. Do you have any recommendations for low-maintenance plants that would thrive in a reading nook?
